name: 周淑咏美Mikukada
description:
（示例图片的采样与CFG）Sampler:DPM++ 2M alt Karras, CFG scale: 6.5,

很喜欢周姐和深田老师，所以希望制作一个两个人合体的LORA，于是就有了"周淑咏美Mikukada"这个LORA,我尽量调教的不完全像两个人中的一个，目前看，大部分的图片眼睛像周姐，嘴像深田老师，

I really like Mikuya and Fukada Kyoko, so I wanted to create a LORA that combines the two of them. That's how "周淑咏美Mikukada" was born. I tried my best to make it not look exactly like either of them. Currently, most of the pictures have eyes like Mikuya and a mouth like Fukada Kyoko. I hope you will like it."

1.此LORA适合头像，半身像，打开高清修复效果更佳。

2.此LORA不适合远景，如果有需要则需要放大处理，再重绘脸部。

3.此LORA支持大长腿。

"This LORA is suitable for profile pictures and half-body portraits. Opening it in high definition will produce better results."

2."This LORA is not suitable for long-distance views. If necessary, it needs to be enlarged and the face needs to be redrawn."

3."This LORA supports long legs."

与XXMix_9或majicMIX realistic搭配使用,其他大模型没有测试过。(其实试过几个名气很大的模型，效果不是特别好。)

推荐设置Recommended settings:

  • VAE: vae-ft-mse-840000-ema-pruned (For realistic models)

  • Sampler: DPM++ 2M alt Karras DPM++ SDE Karras

  • Steps: 20 to 35

  • Clipskip: 2

  • Upscaler : 4x-UltraSharp

  • CFG Scale : 6 to 8

meta.prompt: Best quality, masterpiece, ultra high res, (photorealistic:1.4), 1girl, offshoulder, in the dark, deep shadow, low key, <lora:周淑咏美Mikukada:1>,
meta.negativePrompt: ng_deepnegative_v1_75t, badhandv4 (worst quality:2), (low quality:2), (normal quality:2), lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, normal quality, ((monochrome)), ((grayscale))
